name: Play Home
description:
You must work at home because of Covid:

At Home you try to make money (Taps the Computer) and keep you and your child alive
You will hungry and Stress when work: you need Food to recover
Your Child will hungry anh Border: you must keep him alive : by Play with him, Clean 'Shit', Feed him or hire a babysitter (of course all of it need money)
{Remember Not clean the room your child will dying)
You will Win when Covid End.
